rental_menu.title: Rental Service
rental_menu.information: Looking to rent a vehicle? Open the Vehicles for Rent menu, pick your ride, and itâ€™ll be delivered with rental papers and a set duration. Lost it? Click on Recover Vehicle and it will be delivered back to you.
